H0.text: The spleen is the organ that is the site of gas exchange between the body and the environment.

H1.text: Liver is the organ that is the site of gas exchange between the body and the environment.

H2.text: Lungs are the organ that is the site of gas exchange between the body and the environment.

H3.text: The pancreas is the organ that is the site of gas exchange between the body and the environment.

A4.text: Oxygen breathed in, diffuses through the walls of the alveoli into the enveloping capillaries and into the circulation, and carbon dioxide diffuses from the blood into the lungs to be breathed out.
